message.content:
{"nodes":[
  {"id":"startProcess","name":"Start Process","elementType":"startEvent","description":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"userRegistration","description":"Begin the process with user registration"}],"properties":null},
  
  {"id":"userRegistration","name":"User Registration","elementType":"userTask","description":"User registers in the bank's system, providing basic information and creating an account.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"dataCollection","description":"Proceed to data collection"}]},
  
  {"id":"dataCollection","name":"Data Collection","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System prompts the user to enter personal information, such as name, address, contact details, and identification documents.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"documentVerification","description":"Proceed to document verification"}]},
  
  {"id":"documentVerification","name":"Document Verification","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User uploads identification documents (e.g., passport, driver's license), which are processed by an automated document verification system for authenticity and validity.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"riskAssessment","description":"Proceed to risk assessment"}]},
  
  {"id":"riskAssessment","name":"Risk Assessment","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System assesses the user's risk profile based on the provided information, analyzing factors like financial history, occupation, and purpose of the account.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"decisionMakingEd","description":"Proceed to decision making"}]},
  
  {"id":"decisionMakingEd","name":"EDD Decision Making","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"Decision point to determine if Enhanced Due Diligence is required based on the risk assessment","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"edd","description":"Enhanced Due Diligence is required"},{"targetNode":"sanctionsScreening","description":"Proceed to sanctions screening"}]},
  
  {"id":"edd","name":"Enhanced Due Diligence (EDD)","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"If the risk assessment triggers a need for EDD, system requests additional information and documentation from the user to fulfill regulatory requirements.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"sanctionsScreening","description":"Proceed to sanctions screening"}]},
  
  {"id":"sanctionsScreening","name":"Sanctions Screening","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's information is checked against international watchlists and sanction databases to ensure compliance with anti-money laundering (AML) regulations.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"sanctionsDecision","description":"Proceed to sanctions decision making"}]},
  
  {"id":"sanctionsDecision","name":"Sanctions Decision","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"Decision point to determine if the process should continue based on the sanctions screening","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"pepScreening","description":"Proceed to PEP screening"},{"targetNode":"sanctionsNotification","description":"Notify user of sanctions issue"}]},
  
  {"id":"sanctionsNotification","name":"Sanctions Notification","elementType":"userTask","description":"Notify the user that there's a problem identified during sanctions screening.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcess","description":"End the process"}]},
  
  {"id":"pepScreening","name":"Politically Exposed Persons (PEP) Screening","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's status as a politically exposed person is checked against relevant databases to identify potential risks.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"negativeNewsScreening","description":"Proceed to Negative News screening"}]},
  
  {"id":"negativeNewsScreening","name":"Negative News Screening","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's name is screened against news sources and public records for any negative associations or adverse media coverage.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"decisionMaking","description":"Proceed to Decision Making"}]},
  
  {"id":"decisionMaking","name":"Decision Making","elementType":"exclusiveGateway","description":"System analyzes all the collected data, screening results, and risk assessments to determine whether to approve, reject, or escalate the onboarding process.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"approvalRejection","description":"Proceed to Approval/Rejection"},{"targetNode":"manualReview","description":"Proceed to Manual Review"}]},
  
  {"id":"manualReview","name":"Manual Review","elementType":"userTask","description":"If the system identifies potential red flags or discrepancies, it may flag the user's profile for manual review by a compliance officer.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"approvalRejection","description":"Proceed to Approval/Rejection"}]},
  
  {"id":"approvalRejection","name":"Approval/Rejection","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System notifies the user of the onboarding decision, either approving the account opening or providing reasons for rejection.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"accountActivation","description":"Proceed to account activation"}]},
  
  {"id":"accountActivation","name":"Account Activation","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"Upon approval, the system triggers the account activation process, generating account details and necessary documentation.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"userNotification","description":"Proceed to user notification"}]},
  
  {"id":"userNotification","name":"User Notification","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"System notifies the user of successful account activation, providing account details, terms and conditions, and other relevant information.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"ongoingMonitoring","description":"Proceed to ongoing monitoring"}]},
  
  {"id":"ongoingMonitoring","name":"Ongoing Monitoring","elementType":"serviceTask","description":"User's account activity is monitored periodically to identify any suspicious transactions or changes in risk profile, ensuring compliance with regulatory requirements.","properties":null,"connectedTo":[{"targetNode":"endProcess","description":"End the process"}]},
  
  {"id":"endProcess","name":"End Process","elementType":"endEvent","description":null,"connectedTo":null,"properties":null}
]}
